description: React component implementing a sidebar for managing conversations, including loading, adding, selecting, and displaying conversation items with localStorage persistence.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: React functional component rendering a sidebar for conversation management, handling state for conversations and selection, and facilitating add/select actions.

methods.name: handleAdd
methods.description: Handles adding a new conversation with a prompt for title, updating state and localStorage.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Handles selecting a conversation by ID, updating state, and dispatching a custom event.
